### PDF3
```{r}
library(rethinking)
data(bangladesh)
b = bangladesh
head(b)

dat_b <- list( U = b$use.contraception , distr = as.factor(b$district), urban = b$urban , A = b$age.centered, C = b$living.children, alpha = rep(2, 3))

m14pdf3 <- ulam(
  alist(
    U ~ dbinom(1, p),
    logit(p) <- a_dist[distr] + b_urban[distr]*urban + b_Child*sum(delta_shell[1:C]) + b_Age*A ,
    c(a_dist, b_urban)[distr] ~ multi_normal( c(mean_A,mean_bu) , Rho , Sigma ),
    c(mean_A, mean_bu, b_Child, b_Age) ~ normal(0,1),
    Rho ~ lkj_corr( 2 ),
    Sigmam ~ exponential( 1 ),
    vector[4]:delta_shell <<- append_row(0, delta),
    simplex[3]: delta ~ dirichlet(alpha)
  ), data=dat_b , chains=4 , cores=4, log_lik = TRUE )
precis( m14pdf3 , depth=3 )
plot(m14pdf3 , depth=3)

pheno_q ~ dordlogit( phi , kappa ),
```
